length.between: "${label}" must have a length between ${min} and ${max}!
length.exactly: "${label}" must have exactly a length of ${exactly}!
length.max: "${label}" must at most have a length of ${max}!
length.min: "${label}" must at least have a length of ${min}!

password.betweenLength: It must have a length between ${minLength} and ${maxLength}
password.exactlyLength: It must have exactly a length of ${minLength}
password.exclude: It must not contain any of these characters: ${blacklist}
password.lowerCase: It must contain a lower case character
password.maxLength: It must at most have a length of ${maxLength}
password.minLength: It must at least have a length of ${minLength}
password.specialChar: It must contain a special character
password.text: Invalid value. It needs to fulfill the following criteria:
password.upperCase: It must contain an upper case character

ssn.textMinAge: You need to be at least ${minAge} years old!

dateDiff.max: The difference between "${fieldALabel}" and "${fieldBLabel}" must not be more than ${maxDiff} ${maxUnitLabel}!
dateDiff.min: The difference between "${fieldALabel}" and "${fieldBLabel}" must not be less than ${minDiff} ${minUnitLabel}!

dateOrder.text: The following dates must be in chronological order: ${fieldNames}!

sameValue.textA: "${fieldALabel}" and "${fieldBLabel}" must have the same value!
sameValue.textB: "${fieldALabel}" and "${fieldBLabel}" must have the same value!
